anxiety.translation: O Allah, I seek refuge in You from anxiety and sorrow, weakness and laziness.

gratitude.translation: All praise is due to Allah, Lord of the worlds.

protection.transliteration: U'Ä«dhukumÄ bi-kalimÄti'llÄhi't-tÄmmati min kulli shayá¹­Änin wa hÄmmatin wa min kulli 'aynin lÄmmatin
protection.translation: I seek protection for you from the perfect words of Allah against every devil and poisonous creature, and against every evil eye.

forgiveness.arabic: Ø§Ù„Ù„ÙÙ‘Ù‡ÙÙ…ÙÙ‘ Ø¥ÙÙ†ÙÙ‘ÙƒÙ Ø¹ÙÙÙÙˆÙŒÙ‘ ØªÙØ­ÙØ¨ÙÙ‘ Ø§Ù„Ù’Ø¹ÙÙÙ’ÙˆÙ ÙÙØ§Ø¹Ù’ÙÙ Ø¹ÙÙ†ÙÙ‘ÙŠ
forgiveness.translation: O Allah, You are the Pardoner, You love to pardon, so pardon me.

guidance.translation: O Allah, guide me among those You have guided.

morning.translation: We have reached the morning and at this very time unto Allah belongs all sovereignty, and all praise is for Allah.

sickness.translation: O Allah, Lord of the people! Remove the trouble and heal him, You are the Healer.

entering_home.transliteration: Bismi'llÄhi walajna, wa bismi'llÄhi kharajna, wa 'alÄ'llÄhi rabbinÄ tawakkalnÄ
entering_home.translation: In the name of Allah we enter and in the name of Allah we leave, and upon Allah, our Lord, we place our trust.

entering_toilet.translation: O Allah, I take refuge with you from all evil and evil-doers.

waking_up.transliteration: LÄ ilÄha illa'llÄhu waá¸¥dahu lÄ sharÄ«ka lah, lahu'l-mulku wa lahu'l-á¸¥amdu wa huwa 'alÄ kulli shay'in qadÄ«r
waking_up.translation: There is no deity except Allah, alone without partner, to Him belongs all sovereignty and praise, and He is over all things competent.

sadness.transliteration: AllÄhumma innÄ« 'abduka, ibnu 'abdika, ibnu amatika, nÄá¹£iyatÄ« biyadik
sadness.translation: O Allah, I am Your servant, son of Your servant, son of Your maidservant, my forelock is in Your hand.

dailyDua.translation: In the name of Allah, the Entirely Merciful, the Especially Merciful.
